text: Send an air unit back to its owner's hand. Give your HQ +2 defense.
title: AA BARRAGE

text: Send unit back to owner's hand. Enemy does not gain kredit slot or draw a card next turn.

title: AIRSTRIKE

text: Deal 4 damage to the enemy HQ.
title: AIR BLITZ

text: Destroy an enemy unit that has 3 or less attack.
title: AMPHIBIOUS ASSAULT

text: Give your HQ +4 defense and all friendly units +1+1.
